title: Strictly's AJ Pritchard and Saffron Barker fall about laughing as their salsa goes VERY wrong
text:
They're gearing up to perform the salsa on next weekend's Strictly Come Dancing.

And it seems rehearsals aren't going quite to plan for pro AJ Pritchard and YouTuber partner Saffron Barker.

In a clip uploaded to Saffron's Instagram AJ, 24, was seen spinning Saffron, 19, into him, lifting her up by the legs and dangling her above the floor.

Oops! It seems rehearsals aren't going quite to plan for pro AJ Pritchard and YouTuber partner Saffron Barker as they prepare their salsa for this weekend's Strictly Come Dancing

But still clearly in need of a finesse, Saffron slid down AJ's body and ended up landing between his astride legs.

The cute pals ended up bursting into fits of laughter, with AJ strolling off and leaving Saffron on the floor.

She captioned the video: 'When it doesn’t go to plan ... Sneak peak of our SALSAAAA!'

Losing grip: In a clip uploaded to Saffron's Instagram AJ was seen spinning Saffron into him, lifting her up by the legs and dangling her above the floor

Practice makes perfect? Still clearly in need of a finesse, Saffron slid down AJ's body and ended up landing between his astride legs

Off he goes: The cute pals ended up bursting into fits of laughter, with AJ strolling off and leaving Saffron on the floor

The pair attended the Pride Of Britain Awards at Grosvenor House Hotel in London on Monday.

The appearance was fresh from another high-scoring show on Strictly at the weekend, surviving to see another week.

Saffron looked stunning in a pink bodycon dress that had a scalloped turtleneck design with beaded detailing for extra glamour.

Night off: The pair attended the Pride Of Britain Awards at Grosvenor House Hotel in London on Monday

Saffron kept her look simple for the evening, as she opted to forgo wearing flashy jewellery by accessorising with hoop earrings.

Her golden locks were styled into waves that fell elegantly over her shoulders, and the internet star wore a glamorous palette of make-up for the occasion.

Meanwhile, AJ looked dapper in a double-breasted black jacket and grey plaid trousers, which he teamed with a crisp white shirt and a bow tie.

Stylish: Saffron kept her look simple for the evening, as she opted to forgo wearing flashy jewellery by accessorising with hoop earrings

His brunette tresses were slicked up into his signature coiffed style, and AJ finished off the look by stepping out in smart black loafers.

The pair avoided the drama of last weekend, steering clear of the bottom two.

In a dramatic twist, Catherine Tyldesley was axed over Mike Bushell - a decision made by head judge Shirley Ballas, who was criticised afterwards.

She said, while walking the Pride Of Britain red carpet, however, that she 'made the right decision'.
description: It seems rehearsals aren't going quite to plan for pro AJ Pritchard and YouTuber partner Saffron Barker as they prepare their salsa for this weekend's Strictly Come Dancing.
